uniapp.template:

    <path d="M6 12 3.269 3.125A59.769 59.769 0 0 1 21.485 12 59.768 59.768 0 0 1 3.27 20.875L5.999 12Zm0 0h7.5" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-linecap="round"></path>
  </svg>
  <text>Send Message</text>
</button>
